name: Custom software development
data: We plan tailored software solutions for you to achieve operational excellence and deliver them fast and error-free.

name: Software product development
data: We help startups and ISVs envision selling SaaS, mobile and desktop products, launch MVP in 1-4 months and consistently grow it to a full-blown product with major releases every 2-4 weeks.

name: Development team augmentation
data: We can offer from 0.5 FTE to 150+ FTE resources to fill in specific skill gaps (developers and architects well-versed in back-end.

name: Maintenance and support
data: We provide 24/7 support for your employees and customers, continuous software performance monitoring.
